3D Hilbert curve

Zuguang Gu (z.gu@dkfz.de)

2024-09-05

Source: vignettes/hilbert_3d.Rmd
hilbert_3d.Rmd

There are many forms of 3D Hilbert curve. Here we only implement one specific form of it.

pos = hilbert_3d(2)
library(rgl)

plot3d(pos, type = "l", lwd = 4, col = 2, ann = FALSE, axes = FALSE)
